column1: #TX10: @SiegelForTexas is too busy criticizing the United States to denounce the CCP for covering up the coronavirus outbreak and allowing a regional epidemic to become a global pandemic. https://t.co/zYFTKxys6I https://t.co/SP9KRKYBCa

The CCP is America's top national security & economic threat. The CCP is guilty of covering up the COVID outbreak abusing human rights engaging in military aggression & ripping off American workers & businesses. What does @SiegelForTexas say about any of this? Nothing. #TX10 https://t.co/dd6yEjxIdt

#TX10: @SiegelForTexas called Speaker Pelosi a "tremendous leader" -- the same Speaker who delays COVID relief every time she doesn't get her exact partisan wishlist. Republicans asked for a temporary extension of unemployment while negotiations continued & Pelosi walked.

Americans have lost jobs as a result of the coronavirus outbreak. Instead of helping these Americans looking for work @SiegelforTexas would raise middle class taxes and then give taxpayer money to illegal immigrants and people “unwilling to work.” #TX10

The China Task Force's report on the origins of the coronavirus outbreak went viral in China. Now the Chinese Communist Party's propaganda outlets are attacking me and the China Task Force. That means we're winning. -MTM #TX10 https://t.co/WuDXgC3Vxn

The Chinese Communist Party's greatest fear is losing its hold on power. It's why they covered up their monumental failure to contain COVID. It's why they don't allow free speech. It's why they are trying to take over Hong Kong. It's why they try to bully Taiwan. https://t.co/gwczddanx7

We will get through this hard time and be stronger than ever. Just this week:  -USMCA went into effect -June jobs report released: 4.8M jobs created  -Congress extended the PPP to support small biz through covid   #GreatAmericanComeback   https://t.co/XThX7BCtTn

The report I released on the origins of the coronavirus reads like an indictment of the Chinese Communist Party. The CCP covered up the spread of the virus allowing it to become a global pandemic. It should have been contained but the CCP refused to be honest with the world. https://t.co/ubWq2ENMIV

While American scientists are working to develop a life-saving vaccine to rescue the world from coronavirus the CCP is trying to steal that research for their own selfish purposes.   Congress has to be united in condemning these cyberattacks.  https://t.co/C7aywAO9ZU

Speaker Pelosi delayed talks on COVID-19 relief twice. When it came time for her next bill the Speaker chose not to negotiate at all. She crafted 1800 pages and $3T worth of spending w/ ZERO GOP input. It needs to be bipartisan & needs to address bringing jobs back to the USA. https://t.co/rflnKA1bkl

With 36M Americans unemployed due to the COVID19 outbreak Congress needs to debate real bipartisan solutions to help Americans. Pelosi's $3 TRILLION bill is 1800 pages of partisan wish list items that don't solve the daily problems facing American citizens and businesses.

As Chairman of the #ChinaTaskForce I'm working w/ colleagues to:  1⃣ Hold the Chinese Communist Party accountable for its cover-up of COVID19  2⃣ Detail plans for the USA to outcompete the CCP economically. For too long the CCP has taken advantage of American workers. No more. https://t.co/4FufQ1riAI

Here are just some of the things the CCP needs to answer for:   Covering up COVID-19 outbreak Detaining doctors who sounded alarm on COVID-19 Hoarding medical supplies Selling faulty medical supplies Expelling American journalists Spreading propaganda around the world

I'm honored to be chairing the new China Task Force.   We will hold the Chinese Communist Party accountable for its cover-up of the coronavirus and advance comprehensive plans to address the CCP as a strategic adversary.   https://t.co/GPf9Mr6Df9

Honored to deliver supplies & visit with the staff at SAFE Children's Shelter part of the SAFE Alliance in Austin serving victims of domestic violence. Since the COVID-19 outbreak SAFE has experienced a 25% increase in reports & we must come together to protect these victims. https://t.co/iBGpfDgKTV

2003- CCP didn't properly alert world to SARS causing a pandemic. The world devised new rules requiring strict reporting to WHO to avert future crises.   2019- CCP ignored the rules; COVID19 spread killing 100s of 1000s of people & devastating economies.  https://t.co/rjb6yLfMwq

Team McCaul interns spent their weekends making greeting cards to put smiles on the faces of hospitalized children who are not allowed to have visitors during the coronavirus outbreak. #InItTogether https://t.co/DUvasz3dxD

#ChineseCommunistParty's hypocrisy on COVID-19 🚨  1⃣ Says don't criticize other countries then blames US 2⃣ Calls for cooperation then price gouges nations in need 3⃣ Warns against wasting time but withheld critical information from the world for weeks

Coronavirus has caused economic devastation across Texas and America. Now some are hijacking this crisis to push a job-killing Green New Deal that abolishes oil and gas. Now more than ever we have to defend the hundreds of thousands of oil and gas jobs in Texas!

WHO funding from the USA should be conditioned on the resignation of Director-General Tedros⬇️  WHO knew COVID19 spread via humans 3 wks before telling the world   Tedros delayed declaration of world health emergency  Tedros is a puppet of the CCP  https://t.co/LctwCf9Foq

When America defeats the virus it will be time to hold the Chinese Communist Party accountable for its role in the coronavirus outbreak and orchestrating one of the worst cover-ups in human history.  https://t.co/8ro1MFQUTj

Team McCaul dropped by @HCAHouNorthCyp to deliver @hananscafe for lunch to our front-line healthcare workers. We are so grateful for their dedication to fighting coronavirus and keeping us safe and healthy. #TX10 #InItTogether https://t.co/UwjRdkyyaD
Fellow Texan Mark Cuban says Phase 3 coronavirus small business loans plan (Paycheck Protection Program) is 'the best deal ever offered in the history of business". https://t.co/2DwmtXX1OE

Team McCaul stopped by the Bellville and Sealy Police Departments to extend a social distanced but heartfelt thank you (and donuts & kolaches) to our law enforcement officers and first responders for their service especially during this public health crisis. #TX10 #InItTogether https://t.co/D5ZLzPpZ4x

Since the coronavirus outbreak I've spoken with hundreds of small biz owners across #TX10. Phase 3's small business relief is working. Businesses can stay open & keep paying employees. We should expand this program ASAP to deliver more relief to American workers.

#TeamMcCaul has been keeping busy. This week interns sent out over 100 letters to local nursing homes to help cheer up residents who can't have visitors because of coronavirus. #InItTogether https://t.co/wmEo2Bzxja

One of the greatest cover-ups in human history ⬇️  The #coronavirus spread like wildfire while the Chinese Communist Party not only turned a blind eye but actively attempted to hide the disease from its own people and from the world.    https://t.co/3OpRzjCWba

🚨 Chinese Communist Party's Response to #Coronavirus  1⃣ Cover up the outbreak 2⃣ Detain doctors who raised alarms 3⃣ Spread disinformation that US caused it 4⃣ Expel US journalists  5⃣ Price gouge hurting nations & send faulty medical supplies  https://t.co/ZPovxk7ets

Glad to see Senate reaching a compromise on economic relief. We must stand united as Americans. Nancy Pelosi's attempt to tie Green New Deal policies and other gifts for progressive special interests to pandemic relief must be rejected.  #Coronavirus   https://t.co/m4XS9NYr6z
The Families First #Coronavirus Response Act made tests free for all Americans. The private sector is stepping up to help get test kits out to every person who needs one. https://t.co/zm6Ave9NnN

This veteran and 9/11 responder carrying an American flag from September 11th through the streets of NYC to show support for first responders during the #CoronavirusOutbreak is a reminder that we are going to get through this united as Americans. https://t.co/KMKUeTOAx2

The Chinese Communist Party covered up the #coronavirus for weeks while they could have been containing it better. Now the world is facing a global pandemic. The CCP needs to be held accountable.   https://t.co/tIREsIA16D

The Chinese Communist Party's expulsion of US journalists is an attack on the free flow of info. When the CCP spreads disinformation like claiming the US military brought the #coronavirus to China it just further undermines the regime's credibility.  https://t.co/Etg1k1uCro

It is vital that we all continue to fight #coronavirus by staying home washing our hands often and social distancing.   Watch the video below to understand how we are all in this together. Every one of us can help save lives.  https://t.co/KQNIeCXbd9

The Chinese Communist Party tried to cover up the #Coronavirus. They can't get away with it this time.  Our top priority is saving lives. After we do that the CCP must be held responsible and America must bring the manufacturing supply chain back home.   https://t.co/hCmI7WXjzF

Sending a heartfelt thank you to everyone fighting #coronavirus: doctors nurses healthcare professionals grocery store workers delivery people custodial workers law enforcement officers scientists and many more. We are grateful for your service and dedication!
Testing is critical to #SlowtheSpread across Texas and the country as we all continue to take steps to contain COVID-19.   https://t.co/BFYKDizgIv

Use #SocialDistancing to #FlattenTheCurve by slowing the spread of #coronavirus to avoid overwhelming hospitals. Learn more about the importance of acting early to prevent exponential growth:   https://t.co/Kiz0l5XSoL
Working with local state & federal officials to make sure #TX10 has the resources it needs to deal with the #coronavirus. Now is a time for unity.  https://t.co/77bOhl1j84

These are uncertain times but Texans are no strangers to crisis. We'll get through this united as Texans and Americans.   #Coronavirus Update:   1⃣ There are currently 3 antivirals being tested that are showing promise 2⃣ A clinical trial vaccine is being tested today in the USA https://t.co/B0rNTQl3RO

Practice #SocialDistancing by avoiding crowded places when possible. If you need to be in public keep at least 6 feet between yourself and others to avoid catching and passing on #coronavirus.    https://t.co/YvzphMOhLa
The Families First Coronavirus Response Act gets free tests out to everyone in America who needs them. #SocialDistancing will help us flatten the curve. #Coronavirus https://t.co/FJ6xyKF6cb

The Families First Coronavirus Response Act will:  -Ensure that coronavirus tests are free for all Americans -Provide two weeks of paid sick leave and up to three months of paid family and medical leave for those affected by coronavirus (1/2)

That is why I voted in favor of the Families First Coronavirus Response Act. I will continue to work with Democrats and Republicans along with federal state and local health officials during this time. (2/2)  https://t.co/84sZGM8sYL

Texans whether they are uninsured or insured should have access to free #coronavirus testing during this national health emergency. In addition during this crisis paid emergency and sick leave is a necessary step for all of those either sick or quarantined. (1/2)
Wash your hands often avoid close contact stay home if you’re sick and visit the @CDCgov official site (https://t.co/h0mx4e9FHM) to stay up to date on the latest #Coronavirus information.
The #coronavirus is a humanitarian issue that demands all members of Congress come together to protect Americans. Now is not the time for fear-mongering or political blame games.
